matrix.title: Premium Dies for Pellet Mills | LKE Group GmbH | GoldenDie
matrix.description: High-quality dies for pellet mills of any type from LKE Group GmbH. Custom manufacturing according to customer drawings, superior hardness and wear resistance, up to 10% less wear compared to competitors. Flat dies, ring dies, and twin-track dies available.

shell.description: High-quality roller shells for pellet mills from LKE Group GmbH. Various surface types (perforated, corrugated, fishbone), custom dimensions, superior wear resistance. Up to 7% less wear compared to competitors. For flat dies, ring dies, and twin-track dies.

about.title: COMPANY PROFILE
about.text:
GOLDENDIE is a brand of LKT Group GmbH that supplies technical spare parts for industrial equipment, including dies, shells, rollers for pellet mills of any type, eccentric shafts, as well as hammers, shafts, and screens for hammer mills and separators.

The production supports any spare parts in small and large volumes based on the drawings available in the LKT Group GmbH database, as well as exclusively based on drawings provided by the customers.

Every unit produced under the GOLDENDIE brand is processed using CE-certified equipment, ensuring the quality and compliance of the product's workmanship.
